attributes.action: Introduce ovarian screening with tests every 3 years
attributes.additional_details:
Early stage symptoms of ovarian cancer are symptoms we can get on a daily basis, and mostly fobbed off as “IBS” , early stage symptoms are bearable 
 
Once you have the symptoms which now start to Cause concern it’s most likely spread and not much change of survival 
 
My issue is that I had no idea about this and am angry that women are not given routine screenings like breast screening and smear tests. Ovarian cancer is called the silent killer 
We need to be regularly screened for ovarian cancer
attributes.background:
Currently I am undergoing some urgent tests to rule out Ovarian Cancer, I have never been afraid of becoming ill knowing you have a good chance to fight with all you have. 
Unfortunately what I have discovered is that once you are at a stage with the symptoms being a concern it’s possibly too late
